title: 820-00875 slow
message: Clean board, tested on different known good case/screen/battery etc with clean ME BIOS and clean OS and same problem, fan spins normal speed.

title: 820-00875 slow
message:
Did you test with another SSD?
Also try USB macOS, removing internal SSD.

title: 820-00875 slow
message: I tested with original SSD removed and external OS connected via USB, same problem.

title: 820-00875 slow
message:
Check if any error pops up starting in Diagnostic mode.

Test disconnecting the battery.
Also test with known good battery.

title: 820-00875 slow
message: No errors come up in DM, already tested without battery and also tested in a different known good chassy and same problem.

title: 820-00875 slow
message:
Clean ME BIOS for sure?

Check if HWMonitor reports any strange value.
Fan spins normal?

title: 820-00875 slow
message: I will try different BIOS just to make sure, fan spins normal and HWMonitor reports no problems.
